item.title: Linux Workstation
item.description: This book describes how I setup a Linux Workstation (on a personal Desktop or Laptop computer).

item.title: Self-hosting Docker with d.rymcg.tech
item.description: This book describes how to get started with self-hosting your own Docker server, using the tools provided by d.rymcg.tech.

item.title: OpenSSH
item.description: This book describes how to use OpenSSH, both as a client, and as a server.

item.title: Publishing with org-mode, ox-hugo, and literate programming.
item.description: This book describes how this site is written, in Org-mode, with ox-hugo, and bits of Literate Programming.
